text:
@ed_son @PmBoris @michaelgove @DominicRaab @MattHancock 
Note extremely well what Emily Maitlis is saying. Because it is the truth!!! Unlike what Trump says the Coronavirus pandemic will not be forgotten and will be the cause of fundamental change in society. You will be yesterday's men!
